org.whired.ghostclient.client.module
Interface Module

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DebugModule, ExternalMapModule, PlayerGraph, PrivateChatModule, PublicChatModule
public interface Module
extends java.io.Serializable

A module that can be added to the frame

Author:
Whired

Method Summary
 java.awt.Component getComponent()
          Gets the component for this module
 GhostEventAdapter getEventListener()
          Gets the event listener for this module, can be null
 java.lang.String getModuleName()
          Gets the name of this module
 void load()
          Invoked from the EDT after the module is added to a view and all resources have been set
 void setFrame(GhostClientFrame frame)
          Invoked when the frame that uses this module is adding it; implementing module should save frame as a reference
 void setResourcePath(java.lang.String path)
          Invoked after the module is initialized to set the location of this module on the disk.
 

Method Detail

Gets the name of this module

Returns:
the name

getComponent

java.awt.Component getComponent()
Gets the component for this module

Returns:
the component

setFrame

void setFrame(GhostClientFrame frame)
Invoked when the frame that uses this module is adding it; implementing module should save frame as a reference

getEventListener

GhostEventAdapter getEventListener()
Gets the event listener for this module, can be null

setResourcePath

void setResourcePath(java.lang.String path)
Invoked after the module is initialized to set the location of this module on the disk. This value should be saved if remote resources need to be loaded.

Parameters:
path - the path to save

load

void load()
Invoked from the EDT after the module is added to a view and all resources have been set
